At 3rd level, you gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain two of the following Metamagic options of your choice. You gain another one at 10th and 17th level.Â You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.KKxMb0FyOgOGKhLT]{Careful Spell}

Spend 1 point to choose creatures to succeed on a saving throw caused by your spell.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.A5yrEpqQSXXnyas7]{Distant Spell}

Spend 1 point to double the range of a spell.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.nxE6rUqzqb5RXiFo]{Empowered Spell}

Spend 1 point to reroll the damage of a spell.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.DF2gUqdTCPl1L7wD]{Extended Spell}

Spend 1 point to double the duration of a spell.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.g1Qw9swbH7cNBAxJ]{Heightened Spell}

Spend 3 points to give one creature disadvantage on its saving throw against your spell.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.fU0USJUpzWGeqKwm]{Quickened Spell}

Spend 1 point to reduce the casting time of a spell from 1 action to 1 bonus action.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.qeB5ElOG2Xqj03Am]{Seeking Spell}

Spend 2 points when you miss a spell attack to roll another d20.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.ojsCOOLZaQRWYONT]{Subtle Spell}

Spend 1 point to cast a spell without its somatic or verbal components.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.5Vz8htPAi4S0xT49]{Transmuted Spell}

Spend 1 point to change the damage type of a spell.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.Kyo96bdDRpO1FiOo]{Twinned Spell}

Spend a number of points to have a single-target spell target a second creature.

Note: Drag your chosen Metamagic options above onto your character.
